customhtml2.customHTML:
THE NEW VIA OLYMPUS 2

THE NEW VIA
OLYMPUS 2

Comfort. Performance. We built it for both. The new VIA Olympus 2 features a softer Altra EGO™ MAX foam, plush upper, and rocker shape geometry for big miles.
Shop Women
Shop Men

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
Soften Up

The VIA Olympus 2 features a softer Altra EGO™ MAX midsole foam, with the same generous stack height but light, luxurious (and squishier) cushion.

customhtml2.customHTML:
Love at First Step In

Step into that “ahh” feeling as you lace up. With a plush Ortholite X55 footbed, experience an improved step-in feel that will follow you with every stride.

Shop Women
Shop Men

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
Love at First Step In

Step into that “ahh” feeling as you lace up. With a plush Ortholite X55 footbed, experience an improved step-in feel that will follow you with every stride.

Shop Women
Shop Men

Move Naturally 

Room for your toes and zero drop create Altra’s natural fit, so you can move the way you were designed to. Stay comfortable and stay running, forever.

customhtml2.customHTML:
Keep on Rockin’

Rocker shape geometry encourages an efficient toe-off and a smooth, quick roll through your stride while a refined molded heel collar provides a comfortable, secure fit.
